00061   {

00063 
00064   }
00065 
00067   inline Standard_Boolean GetModifiedShape(const TopoDS_Shape& theOldShape,
00068                                            TopoDS_Shape& theNewShape) const
00069   {
00070     theNewShape = myContext->Apply(theOldShape);
00071     return (!theNewShape.IsSame(theOldShape));
00072   }
00073 
00075   inline Standard_Boolean IsDone() const
00076   {
00077         return myDone;
00078   }

00084   }

00088   {
00089         return myContext;
00090   }
00091

00094   {
00095     return myErrorStatus;
00096   }
